item.title: Apple, Anti-Malware, Patents
item.author: shantanu@shantanugoel.com (Shantanu Goel)
item.description: Recently, there has been this trend. Blogs look for patents filed by companies and then report on each of them as if they are second coming of Jesus in technology. Especially if it is Apple who is doing the filings. A few days ago, this new patent showed up about Apple’s “new wave approach to fighting malware” with the author giving up half-researched commentary on it. I was intrigued by this news (if you can call it that), not because itâ€™s something new but instead because process isolation is hardly a new concept.
